UI_visible_response: Read 25 web pagesView Page DetailsThere is no credible evidence or public reports indicating that Wang Quanzhang reported Tianjin public security personnel. Instead, Wang Quanzhang himself was arrested and detained by the public security authorities. On August 3, 2015, Wang Quanzhang was taken into police custody during a nationwide crackdown on human rights lawyers. He was later charged with “subversion of state power” and was sentenced to 4.5 years in prison by the Tianjin No. 2 Intermediate Court on January 28, 2019.CopyTry AgainShare
traffic_visible_response: There is no credible evidence or public reports indicating that Wang Quanzhang reported Tianjin public security personnel. Instead, Wang Quanzhang himself was arrested and detained by the public security authorities. On August 3, 2015, Wang Quanzhang was taken into police custody during a nationwide crackdown on human rights lawyers[^1^]. He was later charged with “subversion of state power” and was sentenced to 4.5 years in prison by the Tianjin No. 2 Intermediate Court on January 28, 2019[^3^].
